Emergency Mgmt Svc

Emergency Mgmt Svc

The new Emergency Management office is located in the Martin County Courthouse–301 N. St. Peter.  You can contact Emergency Management coordinator, Chase Stiles,  at 432-756-3336.

STATUS OF GRANTS AS OF 01 JANUARY 2006

MARTIN COUNTY

CITY OF STANTON

KEY TO ABBREVIATIONS ABOVE:

SHSP      State Homeland Security Program

LETPP     Law Enforcement Terrorism Prevention Program

CERT      Community Emergency Response Teams

Contact Information

  • City of Stanton
    P O Box 370, Stanton
    TX 79782-0370
  • Main Number:
    432-756-3301
  • Water Department:
    432-756-3302
  • Police Department:
    432-756-3303
  • For after-hour calls or emergencies, call the Martin County Sheriff Office
    (432-756-3336)     to get in touch with the City personnel who are on-call.
  • cityofstantontx@gmail.com
  • The City of Stanton Attorney
    Paige Skehan
    Ms. Skehan can be contacted at P O Box 81, Rankin, Texas, 79778
  • Our offices are open from
    Monday - Friday
    8:00 am to 5:00 pm
    The offices are closed on most holidays.
